svg.text: Week in Ethereum News - June 1 2024

title: "Week in Ethereum News
June 1, 2024" date: "2024-06-01"
Eth News and Links
PeerDAS included in Pectra upgrade but with separate activation epoch, proposal to extend ENS to Layer
2 & Biden vetos congressional disapproval of SEC SAB 121
All core devs
‚Ä¢ All core devs ‚Äì consensus (ACDC) #134 .¬† Notes from Christine Kim : Pectra (Prague + Electra)
upgrade : Discussion on when/what to ship : Options included splitting Pectra ( Lodestar proposal ) or
replacing EIPs with PeerDAS EIP7594 PeerDAS: included in Pectra but with separate activation epoch to
allow moving to a later upgrade if needed Blob size increase : no decision ( blob target of 3 reached
this week) EIP7688 change SSZ data to StableContainer : no decision, discuss at next ACDC, need more
implementation progress
All core devs ‚Äì consensus (ACDC) #134 .¬† Notes from Christine Kim :
‚Ä¢ Pectra (Prague + Electra) upgrade : Discussion on when/what to ship : Options included splitting
Pectra ( Lodestar proposal ) or replacing EIPs with PeerDAS EIP7594 PeerDAS: included in Pectra but
with separate activation epoch to allow moving to a later upgrade if needed Blob size increase : no
decision ( blob target of 3 reached this week) EIP7688 change SSZ data to StableContainer : no
decision, discuss at next ACDC, need more implementation progress
‚Ä¢ Discussion on when/what to ship : Options included splitting Pectra ( Lodestar proposal ) or
‚Ä¢ Options included splitting Pectra ( Lodestar proposal ) or replacing EIPs with PeerDAS
Options included splitting Pectra ( Lodestar proposal ) or replacing EIPs with PeerDAS

upgrade if needed
EIP7594 PeerDAS: included in Pectra but with separate activation epoch to allow moving to a later
‚Ä¢ Blob size increase : no decision ( blob target of 3 reached this week)
Blob size increase : no decision ( blob target of 3 reached this week)
‚Ä¢ EIP7688 change SSZ data to StableContainer : no decision, discuss at next ACDC, need more
EIP7688 change SSZ data to StableContainer : no decision, discuss at next ACDC, need more

discuss at next ACDE

at next ACDE
Pectra (Prague + Electra) upgrade

potential changes, ERC-standardized proxy contract & wallet best practices

üö® Lido increased to 29% , too close to 33.3% threshold
‚Ä¢ Client diversity (via clientdiversity.org ): Execution layer: Geth ~55% majority Consensus layer:
Prysm 38% Any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality

‚Ä¢ Execution layer: Geth ~55% majority

Better geographic diversity is optimal , particularly outside of North America & Europe

& Geth snapshots

Geth snapshots

‚Ä¢ Gossipsup performance in P2P, average effectiveness ratio is more than 1:10 across topics

Client Releases
‚Ä¢ Execution layer: Besu v24.5.2 : default Bonsai storage mode to use code storage by code hash & use
flat db and new RPC methods to get/set vanity extra data in a built block
‚Ä¢ Besu v24.5.2 : default Bonsai storage mode to use code storage by code hash & use flat db and new
RPC methods to get/set vanity extra data in a built block
